name: BloodRusTek
description:
Bloodrustek is a game where everything has been done to you were justified for the cause of love. Go all the way up to the end, and justify that for the cause of war.

This is a game where I continue to explore physics/VR interaction with a focus on expressing weight/Mass of objects. Have fun!

Team Name: Team Hamzawa muhd@7amze.com

A windows game, Requires HTC Vive/Vive pro HMD.

Use triggers to Grab and facebutton to teleport.

Heavy objects requires 2 hands

Your hands could break so be careful.

Non-Original Assets used (Made prior to Contest):

  1. Animation starter Pack (Market Place)
  2. Sound effects/Ambient provided by Soundly
  3. SciFi Kitbash Level Builder (Market Place)
